headline: These 2 Dividend Stocks Also Happen to Be American Companies (Somewhat) Insulated From Trade War Troubles
summary: With so much recent market volatility, investors may prefer to buy stocks of companies that pay steady dividends.  It would be even better to buy dividend payers that are less impacted by the ongoing trade war.  The key is making sure companies can keep covering their dividends, and ideally be able to increase them in the future.
